mapper.select: SELECT itempurchase.purchase_idx ,itempurchase.purchase_date ,itempurchase.purchase_status ,itempurchase.item_idx ,itempurchase.item_name ,itempurchase.item_content ,itempurchase.price ,photo.itemfile_name FROM (SELECT purchase.purchase_idx ,purchase.purchase_date ,purchase.purchase_status ,item.item_idx ,item.item_name ,item.item_content ,item.price FROM purchase JOIN item ON purchase.item_idx=item.item_idx WHERE purchase.member_idx = #{memberIdx}) itempurchase JOIN photo ON itempurchase.item_idx=photo.item_idx
